biotools.summary: MutationInfo is a python package to extract the position, the reference and the alternative sequence of a genomic variant. It accepts variants in dbSNP rs format or in HGVS format.

bioschemas.name: MutationInfo
bioschemas.summary: MutationInfo is a python package to extract the position, the reference and the alternative sequence of a genomic variant. It accepts variants in dbSNP rs format or in HGVS format.
